attributes.action: ensure that Chas and Dave must feature in the opening/closing Ceremony of the Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition requesting that Chas and Dave appear in either the opening and closing ceremonies.  They are icons of London and fully represent Cockney culture at it's best.

ALL hit songs must be included and both Chas and Dave should lead in a good old fashioned sing-along of pub favourites.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
